Controller

Class PriceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.PriceManager

  • public class PriceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for calculating the ticket prices based on the various factors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PriceManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static double applyAgeFactor(double price, Ticket ticket)
      This method modifies the price by applying percentage discounts to the price based on the age group
      private static double applyCinemaClassFactor(CinemaClass cinemaClass)
      This method returns the price based on the class of the cinema
      private static double applyDayOfWeekOrPHFactor(double price, java.time.LocalDate date)
      This method modifies the price by applying increment to the ticket price based on the day of week or whether is a public holiday
      static double applyGSTFactor(double price)
      Given a price, this method returns the price value after applying GST increment.
      private static double applyMovieTypeFactor(double price, MovieType movieType)
      This method modifies the price by applying increment to the ticket price based on the movie type, such as 3D movie or blockbuster movie
      static double calculateTicketPrice(Ticket ticket)
      This methods helps to calculate the price of a movie Ticket based on the following factors: Age, CinemaClass, Day of Week, MovieType (eg 3D or Blockbuster)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PriceManager

        public PriceManager()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTicketPrice

        public static double calculateTicketPrice(Ticket ticket)
        This methods helps to calculate the price of a movie Ticket based on the following factors: Age, CinemaClass, Day of Week, MovieType (eg 3D or Blockbuster)
        Parameters:
        ticket - Ticket object to be used for price calculation.
        Returns:
        Price of the ticket

      • applyCinemaClassFactor

        private static double applyCinemaClassFactor(CinemaClass cinemaClass)
        This method returns the price based on the class of the cinema
        Parameters:
        cinemaClass - The cinema class of the cinema in which the movie ticket belongs to
        Returns:
        The base price based on each cinema class

      • applyDayOfWeekOrPHFactor

        private static double applyDayOfWeekOrPHFactor(double price,
                                               java.time.LocalDate date)
        This method modifies the price by applying increment to the ticket price based on the day of week or whether is a public holiday
        Parameters:
        price - The price
        date - The date of the showtime that is linked with the ticket bought
        Returns:
        The new price of the ticket after the increment

      • applyMovieTypeFactor

        private static double applyMovieTypeFactor(double price,
                                           MovieType movieType)
        This method modifies the price by applying increment to the ticket price based on the movie type, such as 3D movie or blockbuster movie
        Parameters:
        price - The price
        movieType - The type of the movie that is linked to the ticket bought
        Returns:
        The new price of the ticket after the increment

      • applyAgeFactor

        private static double applyAgeFactor(double price,
                                     Ticket ticket)
        This method modifies the price by applying percentage discounts to the price based on the age group
        Parameters:
        price - The price
        ticket - The ticket type, such as an adult ticket or a senior citizen ticket
        Returns:
        The new price of the ticket after the increment

      • applyGSTFactor

        public static double applyGSTFactor(double price)
        Given a price, this method returns the price value after applying GST increment. This is used for calculation of the final price of an order/transaction, not the individual tickets.
        Parameters:
        price - Price before GST
        Returns:
        Price after GST
